mapper.sql: itemID, itemCode, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_TYPE, RESOURCE_PCODE, RESOURCE_LEVEL, RESOURCE_URL, RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SORT, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt
mapper.select:
select
from resource order by itemUpdateAt desc

select r.itemID, r.itemCode, r.RESOURCE_NAME, r.RESOURCE_TYPE, r.RESOURCE_PCODE, r.RESOURCE_LEVEL, r.RESOURCE_URL, r.RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION, r.SORT, r.CREATER, r.itemCreateAt, r.UPDATER, r.itemUpdateAt from resource r,resource_role_ref r3, role r2 where r.itemCode = r3.RESOURCE_CODE and r3.ROLE_CODE = r2.itemCode and r2.itemCode = #{value} and r.RESOURCE_TYPE = 'm'

select r.itemCode, r.RESOURCE_NAME, r.RESOURCE_URL from resource r,resource_role_ref r3, role r2 where r.itemCode = r3.RESOURCE_CODE and r3.ROLE_CODE = r2.itemCode and r2.itemCode = #{value} and r.RESOURCE_TYPE = 'p'
select itemCode, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_URL from resource WHERE RESOURCE_URL = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RESOURCE_TYPE = 'p' order by itemUpdateAt desc

select
from resource where RESOURCE_TYPE = 'p' order by itemUpdateAt desc
mapper.insert: insert into resource (itemID, itemCode, RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_TYPE, RESOURCE_PCODE, RESOURCE_LEVEL, RESOURCE_URL, RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SORT, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt) values (#{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourcePcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resourceLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into resource
itemID,
itemCode,
RESOURCE_NAME,
RESOURCE_TYPE,
RESOURCE_PCODE,
RESOURCE_LEVEL,
RESOURCE_URL,
RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION,
SORT,
CREATER,
itemCreateAt,
UPDATER,
itemUpdateAt,

mapper.update:
update resource
RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_PCODE = #{resourcePcode,jdbcType=CHAR},
RESOURCE_LEVEL = #{resourceLevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
RESOURCE_URL = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION = #{resourceDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update resource set RESOURCE_NAME = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_PCODE = #{resourcePcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESOURCE_LEVEL = #{resourceLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, RESOURCE_URL = #{resourceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_DESCRIPTION = #{resourceDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
